qas.question: When did Americas Great Depression end?
In some world states who did the people turn to?
Who was the most notable Nationalist Demagogue the people turned to?
What did the Convulsion caused by the global depression resul in?

context: The Great Depression ended at different times in different countries with the effect lasting into the next era. America's Great Depression ended in <a0_0>1941<a0_0/> with America's entry into World War II. The majority of countries set up relief programs, and most underwent some sort of political upheaval, pushing them to the left or right. In some world states, the desperate citizens turned toward <a1_0>nationalist demagogues<a1_0/>—the most infamous being <a2_0>Adolf Hitler<a2_0/>—setting the stage for the next era of war. The convulsion brought on by the worldwide depression resulted in <a3_0>the rise of Nazism<a3_0/>. In Asia, Japan became an ever more assertive power, especially with regards to China.
